isis.stitle: STEERABLE DRIVE AXLE END UNIT: FABCO - ADJUSTMENTS - STEERING STOP

svcproc.title: STEERING STOP
svcproc.para: The steering stop adjustment is made at the factory. During normal operation, there should be no need to alter it. When the axle housing or a spindle yoke has been replaced, adjustment may be necessary.

note.para: Toe-in should be corrected before performing this procedure.

svcproc.para: The inside wheel turning angle is 35°. If an adjustment is necessary, loosen the steering stop jam nut on the rear of the spindle yoke and adjust with the 12 point adjusting screw. After adjustment, tighten the jam nut to 75 ft-lbs. (102 N·m).

note.para: Power steering stops in the vehicle steering gear should not allow the application of power to the steering when the steerable drive end is in the full turn condition.
